recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.details: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Fry pancetta. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine all ingredients.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.details: A healthy salad with grilled chicken, fresh vegetables, and a light dressing.
recipes.instructions: 1. Grill chicken. 2. Chop vegetables. 3. Mix together with dressing.

recipes.name: Vegetable Soup
recipes.details: A hearty soup made with a variety of vegetables, perfect for a cold day.
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Cook in broth until tender.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.details: A Russian dish with sautéed pieces of beef served in a sauce with smetana (sour cream).
recipes.ingredients: Beef, Sour Cream, Mushrooms, Onions, Garlic
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté beef and onions. 2. Add mushrooms and cook. 3. Stir in sour cream.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.details: A rich and moist chocolate cake perfect for dessert.
recipes.ingredients: Flour, Cocoa Powder, Sugar, Butter, Eggs
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix ingredients. 2. Bake in oven until cooked through.
